snippet.title: Flawless Abbey — Trailer
snippet.description:
Flawless Abbey is a deeply personal narrative-driven game. As you explore the dream world, a mysterious character starts invading your dialogues with other charachters, making you question the reality. The game features beautiful hand drawings, scanned and rendered into textures.

Flawless Abbey on Steam: https://s.team/a/1575790
